TITLE: About audio cache buffer in VLC Player
TITLE_MSG:
You will need to adjust audio cache buffer size in VLC player.

This page is 'How to change for cache buffer size in VLC player'.
MSG_0001: 2. Open all options by "Show more options".
MSG_0002: 3. My default "Caching" value configuration is 1000 ms. The "Caching" value change more than 3000 ms.
